short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remove the distracting parts of reddit and focus only on what really matters to you.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Distraction Free Reddit is an extension that helps you use Reddit more intentionally. You can block off parts of Reddit to cut out mindless scrolling and increase productivity. The extension includes features like hiding the main feed, hiding r/all and popular, hiding user profiles, hiding full page search, hiding the sidebar, hiding comments, and more. You can also use whitelist or blacklist mode to customise your Reddit experience further.
